subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The L.P.G.A. Tour has moved up the start of the Ginn Tribute’s final round on Sunday in Mount Pleasant, S.C., because of concerns about severe thunderstorms.
snippet: The L.P.G.A. Tour has moved up the start of the Ginn Tribute’s final round on Sunday in Mount Pleasant, S.C., because of concerns about severe thunderstorms.
